reviews.review: great movie. The best one hands down
Everything I wished for and more!

The story is compelling, and the stakes are very high, unlike other Marvel movies. The movie will leave you very satisfied (albeit sad). The only problem is that while characters like Thanos, Iron Man, and Thor are given screen time and meaningful lines, the amount of heroes in the movie doesn't make enough space for screen time for important characters. For example, Cap and all his buddies from Civil War are basically only there to kill aliens in Wakanda, and we don't even see Cap confronting Tony. All in all though, its a good movie.

This movie was absolutely insane, and it truly is the most ambitious crossover ever.
The movie had the right amount of humour that was actually well-timed, but when they had to be serious, they were serious, unlike other movies (cough cough, the Last Jedi).
The only main issue that I had with infinity war was, like Thor Ragnarok, it takes too long for things to happen, but it was a little less infuriating than the transitions we witnessed in the Last Jedi. Infinity war also felt more action-packed than Thor : Ragnarok.
Another thing that could have been improved on is the interactions between the Guardians and the Avengers. We had some good moments, but overall, it could have been better. There also weren't as many characters in the movie as there could have been.
This was awesome, even though the bad guy won. This keeps fans really hungry for the next one.

This is film js the most entertaining movie set in the MCU thus far, it has you at the edge of your seat thru out the entire film, stakes are high the action is awsome, and all is just a perfectly put together film

While being chaotic and incredibly fast paced most of the time, the movie does a good job of concurrently running several storylines while not being tedious to watch. Thanos has been given a lot of depth in this movie and you understand his motive much better than even the comic book universe. The movie does a good job of showing that superheroes aren't infallible and the vulnerability is immediately apparent with that jaw-dropping opening scene. By the time the credits role, you are left shocked in your seat, unable to digest what has just happened and how it will be "rectified" in the future installment of this series.
Best marvel movie!!!! Thanos my guy

MAKING THANOS THE CENTER OF THE STORY WAS A GOOD MOVE. TURNS OUT EVEN CGI CAN HAVE DEPTH OF CHARACTER.
SINCE THANOS GOT ALL THE CHARACTER DEVELOP MENT IT FELT A LITTLE RUSHED AT TIMES FEATURING THE REST OF THE CAST IN VARIOUS DEGREES OF BEING INCLUDED IN THE PLOT. THOSE SIDE CHARACTERS WERE THROWN IN THERE JUST COS. ENDED ON A EMPIRE LEVEL SOUR NOTE BUT LEFT ME INTERESTED IN WHAT HAPPENS NEXT. 
NOTE TO LUCASFILM: EVEN THANOS HAD TO DO STUFF TO BECOME MORE POWERFUL.
